alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 23 at 3:20AM MST until December 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Harding County, Butte County, the Northern Meade County Plains and Bennett County. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 5 AM MST early this morning. For the Wind Chill Warning, until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains
